definition: to conceal/to hide away/to harbor/to store/to collect

sentences.english: TO treasure up Xinjiang with mulberry bark paper.
Hold me in your arms or in your heart.
sentences.chinese: 請將我攬入懷中亦或珍藏於心。

sentences.english: Her love for him is enshrined forever in her poetry.
sentences.chinese: 她對他的愛被永遠珍藏在她的詩中。

sentences.english: They love National Geographic Magazine unfeignedly and regard it as museum piece.
sentences.chinese: 他們由衷地喜愛《華夏地理》雜誌，視爲珍藏。

sentences.english: Memories of his first love were still enshrined in his heart.
sentences.chinese: 他依然將初戀的回憶珍藏在心的神翕裏。

sentences.english: The host city treasures the Olympic flag after it receives it.
sentences.chinese: 主辦城市接過奧運會會旗後都把它珍藏起來。

sentences.english: The decorative case is dapper. The decorative case has perfect visual effects on treasuring articles.
sentences.chinese: 該裝飾盒小巧玲瓏，珍藏物品時有較好的直觀效果。

sentences.english: A good Book is often the Best urn of a life enshrining the Best that life could think out;
sentences.chinese: 好書常如最精美的寶器，珍藏着人的一生思想的精華。

sentences.english: These were days I will always treasure.
sentences.chinese: 那段日子我將永遠珍藏於心。

sentences.english: The enemy soldiers looted the treasures of the art museum.
sentences.chinese: 敵軍士兵搶走了藝術博物館的珍藏。

sentences.english: Santa Loreto Syrah Gran Reserva is made from a blend of Cabernet Sauvignon ans Syrah .
sentences.chinese: 花冠特級珍藏赤西拉是由赤霞珠與西拉混合而成。

sentences.english: A good book is often the best urn of a life, enshrining the best that life could think out;
sentences.chinese: 好書常如最精美的寶器，珍藏着人的一生思想的精華。

sentences.english: The precious gold rings and necklets were encased in box to preserve them.
sentences.chinese: 珍貴的金戒指和項鍊珍藏在盒子裏。

sentences.english: Fundació Joan Miró, Picasso Museum and Fundació Antoni Tàpies hold major collections of these world-renowned artists.
sentences.chinese: 比埃斯基金會擁有很多世界知名藝術家的珍藏品。

sentences.english: This hands over to the artistic conception canvas of the brightness and is collected lightly and shadly by a Swiss friend individual.
sentences.chinese: 這副明暗交輝的意境油畫被一位瑞士友人私人珍藏。

sentences.english: Chang Wen - Jie will personally selected choice to the three private collections and use.
sentences.chinese: 尚雯婕會親自挑選最中意的三套私人珍藏並使用。

definition: to keep hidden/to keep in one's private possession/secret store/stash
to conceal/to hide away/to harbor/to store/to collect
to collect in a museum or library/museum collection/library holdings
covered in dust/dusty/lying unused for a long time
to give a present/to accord (a favor)/to grant
to place great importance on/to treasure
